title: One in a Milltrend 8/20: Aaliyah, Michael Richards, Dan Patrick, COVID babies, Kendrick Lamaar, Paw Patrol, Facebook
itunes:title: One in a Milltrend 8/20: Aaliyah, Michael Richards, Dan Patrick, COVID babies, Kendrick Lamaar, Paw Patrol, Facebook
description:
In this edition of One in a Milltrend, Jack and Miles discuss Aaliyah's albums FINALLY coming to streaming services, Michael Richards very, VERY brief Jeopardy stint, Texas Lt. Gov. Dan Patrick falsely claiming COVID surge is black peoples fault, COVID babies being dumb af, the new Kendrick Lamaar album announcement, the new 'Paw Patrol' movie, and Facebook's FTC case and their new terrible VR platform

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
